It starts with a restatement of your thesis, and it ends with a call to action.<br />&nbsp;</p>","rightText":"<table border=\"1\" cellpadding=\"1\" cellspacing=\"1\" class=\"ju-tableplain ju-tight\" style=\"width: 100%;\"><tbody><tr><td><p><strong>Article<br />Items to buy new vs. items to buy used</strong></p><p>.</p><p>.</p><p>Many factors should weigh into your decision to buy either a new or used product, but you can&#39;t go wrong by following a few simple guidelines.&nbsp; Buy new when individual safety is essential.&nbsp; Also buy new when you need a guarantee that the product will be fresh and clean.&nbsp; Buy used when you can get an item that provides the same content or same experience for substantially less money.&nbsp;
